**精灵秘银胶衣**（elven mithril-coat）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[秘银](/index.php?title=%E7%A7%98%E9%93%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "秘银 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 xNetHack](#xNetHack)
  - [5.5 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.6 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.7 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

非亡灵的[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")有1⁄4的概率在生成时[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件精灵秘银胶衣[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[霍比特人](/index.php?title=%E9%9C%8D%E6%AF%94%E7%89%B9%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "霍比特人 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄10的概率携带一件精灵秘银胶衣[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")和[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神（玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有3⁄124（约2.42%）的概率携带一件精灵秘银胶衣[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

## 描述

精灵秘银胶衣的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为5，且能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")2。由于其材料属于[金属类](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金属类 (page does not exist)")，因此穿戴它会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")。穿上或脱下精灵秘银胶衣只需1回合[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

和其他[精灵族防具](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E6%97%8F%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵族防具 (page does not exist)")一样，精灵秘银胶衣可以在[附魔](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")等级不大于+5的情况下安全地附魔。

## 策略

矮人秘银胶衣的基础AC比精灵秘银胶衣高1点，但附魔等级最多只能安全提升到+5，而精灵秘银胶衣的附魔最多可以安全提升到+7。因此，在需要附魔到最大等级的情况下，精灵秘银胶衣更好。

精灵秘银胶衣是除[龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "龙鳞甲")外最好的铠甲之一，它防御较高，而且相对较轻，适合低[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")的角色，因此绝大多数角色都最好在前期以获取秘银胶衣为目标之一，如果没有[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")机会，秘银胶衣就是前中期最好的铠甲。施法角色（比如[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")）也可以穿戴它来加强防御，只在需要施法的时候脱下。

秘银胶衣的材料是防[侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀 (page does not exist)")的，但它仍然有可能因为玩家[变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形 (page does not exist)")成大型怪物而被撑破。

## 历史

精灵秘银胶衣最初在[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生作品Hack 1.21中出现，后在[NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d")加入，最初它的名称为“精灵锁子甲”（elfin chain mail）。在[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")，它的名称修改为现在的名称。在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本，精灵秘银胶衣能提供[MC3](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")。

在旧版本中，若游戏开启了`TOLKIEN`[编译时选项](/index.php?title=%E7%BC%96%E8%AF%91%E6%97%B6%E9%80%89%E9%A1%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "编译时选项 (page does not exist)")，[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（角色） (page does not exist)")角色（现已[弃用](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%83%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "弃用 (page does not exist)")）在游戏开始时会获得一件精灵秘银胶衣。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_mithril-coat/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions may retain the MC3 granted by wearing an elven mithril-coat, while variants that employ [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") may replace the elven mithril-coat with a similar item that can be made of mithril.

Some variants give elves an AC bonus for wearing an elven mithril-coat or equivalent armor, including [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") player characters.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the elven mithril-coat grants MC3 while worn.

Upgrading an elven mithril-coat produces a [dark elven mithril-coat](/wiki/Dark_elven_mithril-coat "Dark elven mithril-coat"), and vice versa.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), elven mithril-coats grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the elven mithril-coat grants 3 AC, 2 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC3 while worn, and its weight is lowered to 20 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum").

[The Web of Lolth](/wiki/DNetHack#The_Web_of_Lolth "DNetHack") is an intelligent [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") whose base item is a [silvered](/wiki/Silver "Silver") elven mithril-coat, and acts as the chaotic [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for female [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest"), [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger"), [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue"), and [Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard"). While carried, it grants [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"), and while worn it also grants [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance"), [warning of elves](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type") (including other drow) and doubles the damage of that character's beam and ray spells. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") the Web of Lolth refills [energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy").

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), elven mithril-coats are replaced with [elven ring mail](/wiki/Elven_ring_mail "Elven ring mail"), which has a base material of [copper](/wiki/Copper "Copper") and grants 2 AC - a mithril set of elven ring mail behaves identically to an elven mithril-coat, since mithril body armor will always grant at least MC2. Hobbits have the same chance of generating with elven ring mail, which will always be mithril.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), elven mithril-coats are also replaced with elven ring mail, similar to xNetHack.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), elven mithril-coats are replaced with [elven chain mail](/wiki/Elven_chain_mail "Elven chain mail"). Elven chain mail grants 5 AC while worn and has a base material of copper, and grants +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players - when made of mithril, it behaves similarly to an improved elven mithril-coat, and grants two more points of base AC and MC2 (or MC3 for elves).

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), elven mithril-coats are also replaced with elven chain mail, which behaves as in EvilHack.

## 百科文本

\_Mithril\_! All folk desired it. It could be beaten like  
copper, and polished like glass; and the Dwarves could make  
of it a metal, light and yet harder than tempered steel.  
Its beauty was like to that of common silver, but the beauty  
of \_mithril\_ did not tarnish or grow dim.

\[ The Fellowship of the Ring, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

精灵秘银胶衣（elven mithril-coat）是NetHack中的一种铠甲类防具。它由秘银制成。

Contents

  • 2 描述

生成

非亡灵的精灵有1⁄4的概率在生成时携带一件精灵秘银胶衣[1]。霍比特人在生成时有1⁄10的概率携带一件精灵秘银胶衣[2]。

野蛮人、骑士、牧师和女武神职业的玩家怪物在生成时有3⁄124（约2.42%）的概率携带一件精灵秘银胶衣[3][4][5][6]。

描述

精灵秘银胶衣的基础AC加成为5，且能提供MC2。由于其材料属于金属类，因此穿戴它会阻碍施法。穿上或脱下精灵秘银胶衣只需1回合[7]。

和其他精灵族防具一样，精灵秘银胶衣可以在附魔等级不大于+5的情况下安全地附魔。

策略

矮人秘银胶衣的基础AC比精灵秘银胶衣高1点，但附魔等级最多只能安全提升到+5，而精灵秘银胶衣的附魔最多可以安全提升到+7。因此，在需要附魔到最大等级的情况下，精灵秘银胶衣更好。

精灵秘银胶衣是除龙鳞甲外最好的铠甲之一，它防御较高，而且相对较轻，适合低力量的角色，因此绝大多数角色都最好在前期以获取秘银胶衣为目标之一，如果没有许愿机会，秘银胶衣就是前中期最好的铠甲。施法角色（比如巫师）也可以穿戴它来加强防御，只在需要施法的时候脱下。

秘银胶衣的材料是防侵蚀的，但它仍然有可能因为玩家变形成大型怪物而被撑破。

历史

精灵秘银胶衣最初在Jay Fenlason's Hack的衍生作品Hack 1.21中出现，后在NetHack 1.3d加入，最初它的名称为“精灵锁子甲”（elfin chain mail）。在NetHack 3.0.0，它的名称修改为现在的名称。在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本，精灵秘银胶衣能提供MC3。

在旧版本中，若游戏开启了TOLKIEN编译时选项，精灵角色（现已弃用）在游戏开始时会获得一件精灵秘银胶衣。

Variants

  • [[销魔|MC2]]
|cost=240 |weight=150 |material=秘银 }} '''精灵秘银胶衣'''（elven mithril-coat）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[铠甲]]类[[防具]]。它由[[秘银]]制成。 == 生成 == 非亡灵的[[精灵（怪物属性）|精灵]]有{{frac|4}}的概率在生成时[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一件精灵秘银胶衣{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|225|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[霍比特人]]在生成时有{{frac|10}}的概率携带一件精灵秘银胶衣{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|364|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 [[野蛮人（玩家怪物）|野蛮人]]、[[骑士（玩家怪物）|骑士]]、[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]和[[女武神（玩家怪物|女武神]]职业的[[玩家怪物]]在生成时有{{frac|3|124}}（约2.42%）的概率携带一件精灵秘银胶衣{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|174|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|201|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|215|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|242|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 精灵秘银胶衣的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为5，且能提供{{cnlink|MC}}2。由于其材料属于[[金属类]]，因此穿戴它会阻碍[[施法]]。穿上或脱下精灵秘银胶衣只需1回合{{refsrc|src/objects.c|417|nethack=3.6.7}}。 和其他[[精灵族防具]]一样，精灵秘银胶衣可以在[[附魔]]等级不大于+5的情况下安全地附魔。 == 策略 == 矮人秘银胶衣的基础AC比精灵秘银胶衣高1点，但附魔等级最多只能安全提升到+5，而精灵秘银胶衣的附魔最多可以安全提升到+7。因此，在需要附魔到最大等级的情况下，精灵秘银胶衣更好。 精灵秘银胶衣是除[[龙鳞甲]]外最好的铠甲之一，它防御较高，而且相对较轻，适合低[[力量]]的角色，因此绝大多数角色都最好在前期以获取秘银胶衣为目标之一，如果没有[[许愿]]机会，秘银胶衣就是前中期最好的铠甲。施法角色（比如[[巫师]]）也可以穿戴它来加强防御，只在需要施法的时候脱下。 秘银胶衣的材料是防[[侵蚀]]的，但它仍然有可能因为玩家[[变形]]成大型怪物而被撑破。 == 历史 == 精灵秘银胶衣最初在[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]的衍生作品Hack 1.21中出现，后在[[NetHack 1.3d]]加入，最初它的名称为“精灵锁子甲”（elfin chain mail）。在[[NetHack 3.0.0]]，它的名称修改为现在的名称。在[[NetHack 3.4.3]]及更早版本，精灵秘银胶衣能提供[[销魔（3.4.3）|MC3]]。 在旧版本中，若游戏开启了TOLKIEN[[编译时选项]]，[[精灵（角色）|精灵]]角色（现已[[弃用]]）在游戏开始时会获得一件精灵秘银胶衣。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} Variants based on NetHack 3.4.3 and earlier versions may retain the MC3 granted by wearing an elven mithril-coat, while variants that employ [[object materials]] may replace the elven mithril-coat with a similar item that can be made of mithril. Some variants give elves an AC bonus for wearing an elven mithril-coat or equivalent armor, including [[Elf (starting race)|elven]] player characters. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], the elven mithril-coat grants MC3 while worn. Upgrading an elven mithril-coat produces a [[dark elven mithril-coat]], and vice versa. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], elven mithril-coats grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], the elven mithril-coat grants 3 AC, 2 [[DR]] and MC3 while worn, and its weight is lowered to 20 [[aum]]. [[dNetHack#The Web of Lolth|The Web of Lolth]] is an intelligent [[chaotic]] [[artifact]] whose base item is a [[silver]]ed elven mithril-coat, and acts as the chaotic [[crowning]] gift for female [[Drow (starting race)|drow]] [[Priest]]s, [[Ranger]]s, [[Rogue]]s, and [[Wizard]]s. While carried, it grants [[magic resistance]], and while worn it also grants [[drain resistance]], [[Warned of monster type|warning of elves]] (including other drow) and doubles the damage of that character's beam and ray spells. [[Invoking]] the Web of Lolth refills [[energy]]. ===xNetHack=== In [[xNetHack]], elven mithril-coats are replaced with [[elven ring mail]], which has a base material of [[copper]] and grants 2 AC - a mithril set of elven ring mail behaves identically to an elven mithril-coat, since mithril body armor will always grant at least MC2. Hobbits have the same chance of generating with elven ring mail, which will always be mithril. ===SpliceHack=== In [[SpliceHack]], elven mithril-coats are also replaced with elven ring mail, similar to xNetHack. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], elven mithril-coats are replaced with [[elven chain mail]]. Elven chain mail grants 5 AC while worn and has a base material of copper, and grants +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven players - when made of mithril, it behaves similarly to an improved elven mithril-coat, and grants two more points of base AC and MC2 (or MC3 for elves). ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], elven mithril-coats are also replaced with elven chain mail, which behaves as in EvilHack. == 百科文本 == {{encyclopedia| _Mithril_! All folk desired it. It could be beaten like copper, and polished like glass; and the Dwarves could make of it a metal, light and yet harder than tempered steel. Its beauty was like to that of common silver, but the beauty of _mithril_ did not tarnish or grow dim. |[ The Fellowship of the Ring, by J.R.R. Tolkien ] }} == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Body armor/zh-CN|JINGLINGMIYINJIAOYI]] [[Category:Elven items/zh-CN|MIYINJIAOYI]]
